snippet: Los Angeles police say five people have been arrested in a holdup in which 14 people were held hostage for hours at a West Los Angeles clothing store.
abstract: Los Angeles police say five people have been arrested in a holdup in which 14 people were held hostage for hours at a West Los Angeles clothing store.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles police say five people have been arrested in a holdup in which 14 people were held hostage for hours at a West Los Angeles clothing store.

headline.main: California: Five Arrested in Hostage Taking
headline.print_headline: California: Five Arrested In Hostage Taking
